user_story: As a user, I want to log in securely so I can access my personalized dashboard.
deliverables: Implement OAuth2 authentication flow. Develop secure session management. Create responsive login/signup UI.

user_story: As an admin, I want to manage user accounts so I can control access and permissions.
deliverables: Build user management dashboard. Implement CRUD operations for user profiles. Add role-based access control (RBAC).

user_story: As a customer, I want to view my order history so I can track past purchases.
deliverables: Develop 'My Orders' section in the user portal. Integrate with backend order database. Display order details with status.
